name: NYC Fastlane Taxi Driver
description:
Fasten your seat belt and get ready for the best taxi service on New York City roads!!

Pick up passengers from busy streets of New York and drop them to their desired destination on time. NYC Fastlane Taxi Driver is packed with a lots of Thrilling and exciting Pick and drop Missions where you have to pick passengers from distant places and drop them off to their desired destination on time. There are different types of NYC environments and realistic 3D graphics which make NYC Fastlane Taxi Driver Unique among all Taxi Racing and pick and drops games.

The game provides challenging missions and provides realistic simulation of driving luxury cars as taxi. As an experienced Taxi Driver you must abide by New York City Traffic rules. Traffic violations will result in reduction from your hard earned money.

Be prepared for the Amazing taxi driving experience in one of the best cities of the world : The Big Apple , The New York City!

NYC Fastlane Taxi Driver Features:
• Amusing Visual and Sounds Effects
• NYC Fastlane Taxing Driving Simulation
• Splendid Variety of Taxi’s with Realistic Vehicle Physics
• Amazing New York City Environment and 3D Graphics
• Realistic Animated Passengers.
• Intelligent Hill Traffic system.
• Thrilling Precision Taxi Driving Experience.
• Futuristic City View

Download the best NYC Taxi Driving & Parking Game Now!!
